name: Baltie Scene
summary: Scene created by SGP Baltie, a tool used for teaching children and adults about computer programming; contains a scene that can be inserted into a Baltie program ( .SGPBPR file) or project ( .SGPBPRJ file); made up of a scene background color and tiles that have different designs on them, such as a train, wall, or bicycle.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
